contentList.content: Absorb Elements

Absorb incoming elemental energy, lessening its effect on you and store it for your next melee attack. Take half damage from the next elemental attack targetting you, and deal an additional [1] of that element type on your next attack.
Absorb Elements

Absorb incoming elemental energy, lessening its effect on you and store it for your next melee attack. Take half damage from the next elemental attack targetting you, and deal an additional [1] of that element type on your next attack.
Absorb Elements: Acid
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Acid damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
Absorb Elements: Cold
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Cold damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
Absorb Elements: Fire
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Fire damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
Absorb Elements: Lightning
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Lightning damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
Absorb Elements: Thunder
The affected entity is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Thunder damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon.
Beast Bond
Grants a friendly or charmed beast <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you.
Beast Bond
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of the bonded target.
Beast Bond
Bonded beast has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you that you can see.
Catapult
Retrieve a light object from the ground and launch it at a creature.
Cause Fear
Awaken the sense of mortality in a creature, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightening</LSTag> it.
The affected creature repeats the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> at the end of its turns.
Ceremony
Perform one of many beneficial religious ceremonies.
Ceremony: Atonement

Touch a creature, granting it Advantage on Ability Checks and Saving Throws using Wisdom.

At the end of each turn, the target must pass a DC 20 Wisdom Saving Throw or take [1].
Atonement

Has Advantage on Ability Checks and Saving Throws using Wisdom.

Must pass a DC 20 Wisdom Saving Throw at the end of each turn or take [1].
Ceremony: Bless Water
Touch a container of water in a creature's inventory, causing it to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS_WATER">Holy Water</LSTag>.
Ceremony: Coming of Age
Touch a humanoid creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Coming of Age
Gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Ceremony: Dedication
Touch a humanoid creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Dedication
Gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Ceremony: Funeral Rite
Perform funeral rites for a corpse.
Ceremony: Wedding

Touch two humanoid creatures, bonding them together in marriage. For the next [1] days, each target gains +[2] to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> while they are within [3] of each other.
Wedding Vows

Happily Married!

For the next [1] days, gain +[2] to your Armor Class while within [1] of your partner.
Earth Tremor

Cause a tremor in the ground, miring the area around yourself in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">thick mud</LSTag> and possibly knocking nearby creatures <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Frost Fingers
Freezing cold blasts from your fingertips.
Silvery Barbs
Force an enemy to reroll a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Can't be used again while still affected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILVERY_BARBS">Silvery Barbs</LSTag>.
Silvery Barbs: Distract

Force an enemy to reroll their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. Then gain the ability to give a friendly creature advantage on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Silvery Barbs: Advantage
Give a friendly creature <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Silvery Barbs: Luck

Can grant one nearby friendly creature Advantage on their next Attack Roll or Saving Throw.

Removed after usage.
Snare

Place a magical trap that captures enemies that walk within [1] of it. It is triggered when a Small or larger creature moves near it, possibly causing all nearby creatures to be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNARE_TRAP">Restrained</LSTag>

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNARE_TRAP">Restrained</LSTag> creatures make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success. Another creature can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Help</LSTag> them to end the effect as well.
Snare
The snare activates when stepped on by an enemy and traps them.
Snare Trapped
Tasha's Caustic Brew
Cover a creature in corrosive acid for as long as you maintain <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>, dealing [1] at the start of each of the creatures turns.
Caustic Brew
Takes [1] at the start of their turn.
Zephyr Strike
Move like the wind, allowing you to avoid provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.

Until the spell ends, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> which deals an additional [1]. Hit or miss, you gain an additional [2] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> until the end of that turn.
Zephyr Strike
Can move without provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
%%% Zephyr Strike Force Damage
Zephyr Strike: Dash
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1].
